title: Point Shot Trilogy Boxed Set
description: Now, you can have the books that introduced Victor Kalinski to the world in one boxed set! The romance of Vic Kalinski and Dan Arou is one that once read, will never be forgotten. In this three-book set, youâ€™ll get to experience all the passion, sarcasm, hockey action, and romance. Readers should be over 18 due to mature language and gay sexual situations. author: V.L. Locey
